table.name: vtiger_cttimetracker
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cttimetracker` ( `cttimetrackerid` int(19) NOT NULL, `related_to` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `total_hour` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `total_min` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `timetracker_no` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `total_time` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, `tracking_user` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `tracking_title` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `tracking_notes` text, `tracking_status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `total_seconds` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `check_in_location` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `check_out_location` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `check_in_address` text, `check_out_address` text, PRIMARY KEY (`cttimetrackerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cttimetrackercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cttimetrackercf` ( `cttimetrackerid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cttimetrackerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
